TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content: Don't get too excited, boys.
Indeed, boys. Calm down, this is all strictly medical and professional tattoo-parlour talk, I think.

Indeed, boys. Calm down, this is all strictly medical and professional tattoo-parlour talk, I think.

First you say you study lasers, now you're saying that you pierce things...

I don't actually study lasers, I study WITH lasers.

And I don't think I've ever intentionally pierced anything, but how hard could it be? You just make a hole and apply heat, right?
I'm just concerned as to why Sempiternal is used to having hot things pressed onto her.

I'm just concerned as to why Sempiternal is used to having hot things pressed onto her.

Well, I like to think my boyfriend's attractive.

ANYWAY

Enough about me, how are you guys doing?

Edited May 31, 2013 by Sempiternal

Well, I like to think my boyfriend's attractive.

ANYWAY

Enough about me, how are you guys doing?

You have to specify that kind of stuff because we all have very sadistic or disturbed minds in here.

It's 95F, It's humid, and for some reason i'm wearing a hoodie and jeans. In Texas. How do you think i'm doing?

(If too aggressive, I blame the weather for my mood)
What am I doing? Planning a manned mission to Dres. Sure, it's only interesting feature is the canyon, but it's easy to land on.

*Falls through ceiling K.O.'d*

...

Just thought i'd get all of your attention.
My little sister means more to me than anything else in the world but recently she seems to be really distant...
I'm terribly sorry to hear that. My little sister occupies a similar status in my life, and I don't know what I'd do without her support.
It's more the opposite for me. I'm the supporter. After he **** she's been through she really needs it.
What's happened to her?
I hope you can help her.
Forget I mentioned it.
Well, I happen to be an only child, so I can't add anything about siblings to this discussion.

Forget I mentioned it.

Good idea.

So... HAS anyone read good books lately?
What's this "book" you speak of? I'm still trying to understand your species...odd linguistic and literary abilities.

pandoras star

the praxis

xelee

mortal chaos

enders game

all in the last two weeks

(all but one are 900 page hard sci-fi)

i am a massive bookworm

Good idea.

So... HAS anyone read good books lately?

I've been reading the Hunger Games. Such a good book!

I've been reading the Hunger Games. Such a good book!

yeah i loved the series wasn't big though MOAR sequals i say
Loving my new flag!

Good idea.

So... HAS anyone read good books lately?

Still muddling through Tom Wolfe's The Right Stuff. It's not that it's a bad book, it's just that lately my time has been taken up with other things (including this site).

Also reading through "Doc" Smith's Lensmen series, which I finally got a copy of a few weeks back. (It's a multivolume set.)

Finally, the closest book in reach of my laptop at the moment happens to be a Penguin Classics collection of selected works written by Marcus Tullius Cicero (though "spoken" might be the better term, since most of them were originally speeches).
*Wild ragebot appears!*

Good idea.

So... HAS anyone read good books lately?

I've read The Onion's Our Dumb World recently. It's basically a fake atlas that uses stereotypes, observations, and various bits of humor to poke fun at the countries of the world.. For example, in Austria's History section they have a picture of Hitler painting with the caption "A young Hitler finishes work on "You Better Buy This Painting If You Know What's Good For You"". If you get it, be sure to save North Korea for last.
